product_name: Novara Strada Road Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: The Novara Strada road bike shorts feature non-chafing, 8-panel construction that lowers drag and delivers high performance for weekend charity rides and lunchtime spins. 4-way stretch fabric and 8-panel construction provide support for hard-working muscles; features a moisture-wicking, quick-drying finish. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays. Novara Gelspot chamois features a microfiber covering that wicks away moisture; ergonomic shaping and smooth, sonic-welded seams reduce friction. Ergonomically shaped gel chamois conforms to body contours; high-density foam enhances cushion. Stretchy chamois fabric is ultrasoft and breathable. Compression hem cuffs keep shorts from riding up legs without the use of elastic or silicon. Mesh side panels enhance airflow. Novara Strada road bike shorts feature reflective accents for visibility in dim light.
